2024 Final Tax Notices

The 2024 Final Tax Notices have been mailed out. A proposed municipal tax rate increase of 8.6% was passed with the 2024 Municipal Budget. This translates to an additional $73.49 tax increase per $100,000 of assessment. To view a summary of what is included in the increase, please visit our Finance Department Page under Municipal Services - Departments - Finance Department. If you have not received your 2024 Final Tax notice by Wednesday, July 31, 2024 please contact the Municipal Office at 705-636-5941.

Emsdale Community Centre

25 Joseph Street, Emsdale

Available for rent as of Thursday September 21, 2023! Contact the Municipal Office for rental details at 705-636-5941.

The new Emsdale Community Centre, 4,100 square foot fully accessible facility features 2 separate meeting rooms, 1 multi-purpose room, plus a fully stocked commercial grade kitchen.

The multi-purpose room has a capacity of 140 people. Meeting Room 1 has a capacity of 15 people. Meeting Room 2 has a capacity of 30 people.

Emsdale Community Gazebo

1695 Emsdale Road, Emsdale

The Gazebo measures approximately 1,400 square feet and has a capacity of 100 people. The Gazebo has lights and numerous electrical hook-ups are available for use. Ample free parking is also available. The Gazebo is available for musical performances, family parties, meetings, programs, classes, and other community events. For more information, please contact the Municipal Office at (705) 636-5941.

Novar Community Centre

25 Laurie Street, Novar

The Novar Community Centre has a capacity of 100 and features a full kitchen as well as a stage for musical performances. This facility provides the perfect space for hosting a wide variety of events including birthday parties, baby showers, business meetings, wedding receptions, dances, family reunions, and many more! For more information on the Novar Community Centre, please contact the Municipal Office at (705) 636-5941.
